column5: I am thinking of sending in a video to Charlie Moore Outdoors and challenging him to a fish off in Quinte on his Beat Charlie Moore show. Just need some help on what I should say in goading him on the tape. Maybe something like " come to Canada where we have seen the Stanley Cup in the last 40 years!  He is a big Bruins fan.  Darren
Not sure what the best "bait" would be Darren.  He did have a really good show a few weeks back with Pat Burns fishing with him.
Didn't he play Jame Bond a few years back......Oh wait that was Roger Moore.

He is a sports nut! I'd bug him about our sports teams vs his. Right now the Celtics are 15th in the East and the Raps are fourth and going to make the playoffs. Tell him the Jays are going to take out the Red Sox and the Leafs are going to smoke the Bruins. Ask him if EVERYTHING is inferior in Boston, including fisherman?
That might do the trick....well done!  dk
Love Charlie Moore, Hope he accepts your challenge and comes up this way. I think playing on his weakness with the Bruins is the way to go.  Cheers, 1leg
DO IT!! LOL   It would be great to see him come and fish in Canada.

Show him a picture of your stitched finger and tell him that's what happened to it the last time you continually poked someone until they did what you wanted them to do  Or you could bribe him with Canadian Beer  Joey
That would be cool. I dont think i have every seen him do a show in canada before.
